# UIWebView.PaginationBreakingMode.page

**Case**

Content respects CSS properties related to page-breaking.

## Declaration

```swift
case page
```

## Constants

- **UIWebView.PaginationBreakingMode.column**: Content respects CSS properties related to column-breaking.
